results.task_name: Create a workunit with full details
results.prompt_sent: I need to track some work on fixing our login page. Create a workunit named "Fix Login Page Bug" in project 519a0d5ce36d4a28861991700195707f. The problem is that users can't log in when they have special characters in their password. We'll know it's done when all character types are supported and there are regression tests. Make it high priority.

tool_calls.name: create_workunit

arguments.name: Fix Login Page Bug
arguments.problem_statement: Users can't log in when they have special characters in their password.
arguments.success_criteria: All character types are supported and there are regression tests.

results.prompt_sent: Save a context note on workunit c9af787b9bec40f5983b8319b3efd477 recording this decision: we chose to fix the password validation on the backend rather than the frontend, because it's more secure. This is a high-importance architectural decision.

arguments.title: Backend password validation fix chosen over frontend
arguments.content: We chose to implement the password validation fix on the backend rather than the frontend, because it's more secure. Backend validation ensures that all requests are validated regardless of client behavior or tampering, providing a stronger security posture.
